overview: Bryan is Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing at Refundo, where he brings over fifteen years of sales and financial services experience. Prior to joining Refundo, Bryan held a variety of executive sales roles at VSGi, IT Services 2, Intuit, and Tax and Accounting Software Corporation (TAASC). While at Intuit, Bryan served as National Account Manager / Premier Accounts, where he led a small team in driving millions of dollars in software sales. Bryan graduated from Oral Roberts University with a bachelors in Christian Ministries Pastoral, and currently resides in Dallas, Texas.
